release_notes.en-US: • Fixed: in Firefox Nightly 57, the list of available locales was not being built neither in the toolbar button nor in the languages window of the add-on, making impossible to switch between languages. Note that due to addons.mozilla.org having recently marked all legacy add-ons as strictly not compatible with Firefox 57.0, this release could not be offered as an automatic update to Nightly users having still enabled the usage of legacy extensions; it can be installed manually though.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US:
• Added a new localization: Catalan (ca). Thanks to Xavi Ivars from Softcatalà, via babelzilla.org, for providing it.
  • Other minor fixes.

release_notes.en-US:
• Changed: the minimum supported application versions are now Firefox 52, Thunderbird 52 and SeaMonkey 2.46.
  • Fixed: the default destination for the "Get more language packs…" command has been updated for some cases:
    • Users of beta builds of Firefox and Thunderbird will find the language packs released for their exact beta build number, instead of the first packs released for that application version.
    • The new Firefox Developer Edition, built now from Beta Firefox builds instead, is now supported.

release_notes.en-US:
• Added a new localization: Swedish (sv-SE). Thanks to A. Regnander from babelzilla.org for providing it.
  • Updated localizations: Lower Sorbian (dsb), Greek (el), Upper Sorbian (hsb) and Latvian (lv).

release_notes.en-US:
• Fixed: The menu of the toolbar button shows in some cases the wrong available languages after uninstalling a language pack (Firefox 47 and later versions).
  • Added a new localization: Traditional Chinese (zh-TW). Thanks to Merci chao from babelzilla.org for providing it.
  • Other minor changes.

release_notes.en-US:
• Added new localizations: Arabic (ar) and Esperanto (eo). Thanks to "noureddin" user from babelzilla.org for providing them.
  • Updated localizations: Spanish (es-ES) and Serbian (sr).
  • Changed: the filesize of the add-on was reduced considerably.
  • Other internal changes.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US:
• Added the ability to restart the application from the Languages pane in the Add-ons Manager, after a switch of the preferred language for the UI.
  • Added: the name of the current system language is now mentioned in the "User Interface Language" window.
  • Added a new localization: Scottish Gaelic (gd). Thanks to "GunChleoc" user from babelzilla.org for providing it.
  • Updated localizations: Spanish (es-ES), Japanese (ja), Korean (ko), Dutch (nl), Romansh (rm), Russian (ru), Ukrainian (uk-UA) and Simplified Chinese (zh-CN).
  • Other internal minor changes.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US: • Added new localizations: Japanese (ja) and Korean (ko). Thanks to "BlueX" user from babelzilla.org for providing them.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US:
• Fixed: broken icon of the toolbar button when using a dark background theme in releases 31 to 40 of Thunderbird and Windows 7/8/10, besides other minor icon sizing ajustments. There is still an unconfirmed report about it not being fixed in the mentioned environments: help to be able to replicate it is needed.
  • Added new localizations: Russian (ru) and Ukrainian (uk-UA). Thanks to goldenapple from babelzilla.org for providing them.
  • Changed: The option to show the respective language tag next to each language entry in the menu of the toolbar button is now enabled by default. It still can be changed anytime in the options window of the add-on, accessible via the Add-ons Manager.

release_notes.en-US:
• Added a new localization: Latvian (lv). Thanks to "Vards" user from babelzilla.org for providing it.
  • Changed: the current default destination to get language packs now uses the domain https://archive.mozilla.org. Users having the previous domain whitelisted to let installations of language packs without the first confirmation dialog will need to update their settings manually.
  • Other minor changes.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.8.5.1
  • Updated German (de) localization.
  • Other minor changes.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.8.5
  • Fixed: the wrong available languages could be shown in some cases after installing many language packs at once.
  • Added new localizations: Greek (el) and Serbian (sr). Thanks to Γιώργος Μαλαμάς (George Malagas) and ДакСРБИЈА ("DakSrbija" user in babelzilla.org), respectively, for providing them.
  • Updated Brazilian Portuguese (pt-BR) localization.
  • Other minor internal changes.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.8.4
  • Added: an empty Languages pane in the Add-ons Manager now displays a link to the support article in SUMO about language packs: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/install-language-packs-get-more-languages
  • Added a new localization: Romansh (rm). Thanks to gionandri from babelzilla.org for providing it.
  • Updated localizations: Spanish (es-ES), French (fr), Dutch (nl) and Chinese Simplified (zh-CN).
  • Fixed compatibility with the version 2 of the Puzzle Toolbars add-on.
  • Other minor changes.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.8.3
  • Fixed missing name of the preferred language in the languages top bar of the Add-ons Manager in some cases.
  • Improved compatibility with Pale Moon 25.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.8.2
  • Added: let to choose the internal package from which the list of available languages is obtained. It's an experimental, advanced feature; it can be useful for add-on developers testing their own translations. Feedback is welcome. More info in: https://github.com/nohamelin/simple-locale-switcher/wiki/Advanced-Hidden-Preferences#provider
  • Removed the link to the "User Interface Language" window from the main options of Firefox & Thunderbird; the support of this little feature has required too much work and hacks. The window is still accesible from the Languages panel of the Add-ons Manager.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.8.1
  • Fixed: Broken button for opening the "User Interface Language" window from the in-content preferences page in Nightly builds (Firefox 33.0a1).
  • Other minor changes.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.8
  • Added: Compatibility with the SeaMonkey suite. Feedback is welcome.
  • Fixed: The "Manage Languages…" item in the menu of the toolbar button is now enabled in all circumstances.
  • Other minor changes.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.7.2
  • Added localization: Portuguese (Brazilian, pt-BR). Thanks to ouesten for providing it.
  • Improved tooltips for the language items in the menu of the toolbar button. It should help with long language names that are too easily truncated when the toolbar button is placed inside the Australis menu panel (Firefox 29 and later).
  • Other minor changes.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.7.1 Changes since latest public release 0.6:
  • Added new localizations: German (de), French (fr) and Dutch (nl). Thanks to Erwin D. Glockner, AriesFr and markh, respectively, for providing them.
  • Improved compatibility with the new Australis theme (Firefox 29 and later); the Languages toolbar button is now built with the mechanisms provided by the new Customization System, allowing it to display its contents inside the main menu panel.
  • Improved compatibility with many popular complete themes.
  • Other minor changes.
Changes since release 0.7:
  • Prevent a possible memory leak introduced in release 0.7.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.6
  • Added localization: Chinese (Simplified). Thanks to YFdyh000 for providing it.
  • Added a preferences window. Access to it via the details page of the extension, in the Add-ons Manager.
  • Fixed some sentences displayed in mixed languages after a switch without restarting the application.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.5.5
  • Added a new preference for to show the language tag next to the respective language names inside the toolbar button. For the moment, it's only accessible via about:config, as extensions.simplels.button.showDescriptions.
  • Recovered the "Restore to Default" button in the "User Interface Language" window for the pending cases. It wasn't still available for users using some specific Linux builds of Firefox.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.5.4
  • Improved compatibility with new Australis customization system (Firefox 28.0a1). All known issues have been managed.
  • Recovered old default destination for the "Get more language packs" command.

text.en-US: This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.5.3
  • Fixed destination of the "Get more language packs" command, due to changes to the Mozilla's servers infrastructure.
  • Fixed: compatibility with the improved in-content preferences page (about:preferences) in Firefox 28.0a1.
  • Fixed cropped contents of the "User Interface Language" window in some cases.
  • Fixed a rare case where the toolbar button shows the wrong selected language after a switch.
  • Other internal minor changes.
Compatibility with the new Australis Customization system recently landed in Firefox 28.0a1 is in progress. There are some known issues, see: https://github.com/nohamelin/simple-locale-switcher/issues/3

release_notes.en-US:
Version 0.5.2
  • Added: the selected language is displayed on top of the Languages pane in the Add-ons Manager, next to a link to the "User Interface Language" window.
  • Fixed the destination of the "Get more language packs" command for non-common platforms.
  • Fixed cropped contents of the "User Interface Language" window in some cases.
  • Improved the appearance of the toolbar button with the icons+text mode for toolbars (only Firefox).
